summary: This is an FBI Collected Item Log documenting the seizure of a DVR system (DVR System #2) from the Metropolitan Corrections Center (MCC) in New York on August 14, 2019. The seizure is part of the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The document is part of a death investigation related to Jeffrey Epstein, who was an inmate at the Metropolitan Corrections Center.

events.title: Seizure of DVR System #2 from MCC
events.description: NYPD seized a NICE VISION PRO Digital Video & Audio Recorder (DVR System #2) from the Metropolitan Corrections Center in New York.

locations: Metropolitan Corrections Center (MCC), 150 Park Row, New York, New York
keyFacts: A DVR system was seized from the Metropolitan Corrections Center (MCC) on August 14, 2019, as part of the Jeffrey Epstein death investigation.
The seized equipment is identified as 'DVR System #2', a NICE VISION PRO Digital Video & Audio Recorder.
The case ID is 90A-NY-3151227, indicating it is an FBI investigation.
The document is an official FBI Collected Item Log, showing procedural evidence collection.
The seizure was conducted by NYPD, and a receipt was not given for the item.
